alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison, northeastern Franklin, northeastern Crawford and southeastern Washington Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Brentwood, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Cass... Saint Paul... Japton... Wyola... Bidville... Sulphur City... Delaney... Arnett... Hicks... Brashears... Crosses... Patrick... Combs... Durham... Redding... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
